text: Fonefan 280215. Golden-orange colour with a beige head. Flavour is caramel, malt, alcohol, fruit, orange peel, pine. Nice beer.
Bottle at The Carnival Tasting in Ulfborg Denmark 2015-02-28. Clear golden beer with an offwhite head. Breadycaramell and fruity aroma. Fruity caramell flavour.
Golden coloured and syrupy in texture. Sweet and malty, light almond. Warming alcohol.

Bottle 750ml. corked @ Carnival Tasting 2015, Denmark. [ As Hachenburger Selection No. 04 Ice-Bock ].Clear medium orange color with a small to average, frothy - fizzy, good lacing, mostly lasting to diminishing, off-white head. Aroma is moderate malty, sweet malt, oxidide, biscuit - apple notes. Flavor is moderate sweet with a average duration, sugary, white sugar, sweet malt, alcohol. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft, finish feel is light alcoholic. [20150228]

Aroma is sweet malts, some fruits, mild alcohol as well as some raisins. Flavour is very similar in a quite nice balance. Tasty and nice Eisbock.
sweet alcoholic aroma,amber, hazy, white foam, light sweetness, lightly bitter, medium body, soft carbonation, nice alcoholic harmonic finish.

Bottle. Hazy golden with a small off-white head and lots of floaties. Aroma is sweet, malty, caramel, fruity and light alcohol. Flavor is very sweet and rather bitter. Dry and rather bitter finish with heavy alcohol. Oily. 030315
Bottle. Small head with short duration. Color is amber with floaties. Aroma and taste are sweet fruits, sugar, caramel, malt and hops. Nice and sweet. Hides alcohol well.
Bottle. Almost no head. Dark yellow coclour. MOderate nmalty and hoppy aroma. Moderate bitter flavor. A´verage moderate bitter fijnish. Creamy palate. Nice eisbock-

Bottle, 75cl. A dense, finger-thick light beige head forms over an unclear orange-golden body with lots of floaties. The aroma is weak for a 12% ABV beer, with fruityness, some sweet maltyness and alcohol. Its warming and full-bodied with a soft carbonation level. Rather sweet, with fruityness and bitterness to deal with it. Alcohol, resins, orange peel and bitterness. Rather warming this one, a bit too warming I think, but quite nice anyway. 150228

Bottle at Carnival Tasting in Ulfborg 2015-02-28. Clear golden beer with a small offwhite head. Bready aroma, caramel, fruity notes, biscuits, some apples. Fruity flavor, raisins, caramel, warming alcohol but not overwhelming, some grapes. Quite ok.

Sampled @ Finest Spirits and Beer Convention Bochum 2014: Orangegoldene Farbe, kein Schaum. Geruch sehr malzig, muffig, alkoholisch. Geschmack sehr malzig, leicht süß, leicht alkoholisch, schwer zu trinken.
Mild alkoholischer, monoton getreidiger Antrunk. Leichte Hefenoten, wenig aromatisch, langweilig. 8/7/7/7//7
Bottle @ @ S&B Bo 14. Malzig-würzig, leicht scharf. Intensiv-malzig, würzig-herb, malzig, dickflüssig. Nett.

750ml bottle. Murky, orangey, dark golden colour with surprisingly huge, slowly, though not fully diminishing, white head. Sweetish aroma of candied fruit, fruit in rum, apple, a touch of almond, hints of alcohol, some hop bitterness. Taste is intense malty, moderate sweetness, hints of candied fruit, sweet, filtered apple juice, welcome bitter hoppy counterweight, a touch of marzipan; some warming alcohol in the lasting, finish. Oily texture, minimally sticky palate. Not overly complex, not too harsh, balanced. Nice sipper.

Mit der neuen Hachenburger-Selection N°4 ICE-Bock setzt die Brauerei offensichtlich die Serie fort und überrascht erneut. Durch den leicht blumigen Antrunk wirkt der Eis-Bock leichter, als er mit seinen 12% wohl ist. Das Flaschen-Design ist wie auch schon die Vorgänger-Versionen bestechend elegant und doch mit dem hell-blau neu definiert.
